TopicTitle: RSS - Plonking 110 tons into earth orbit.

Articles.Content:
Made a moon orbiter station that will buzz (excuse the 'pun') around the moon.

It'll take about 4000+ Delta-V from Earth Orbit to achieve this so with mix-n-match,

Viola..!! I have 110 tons of metal, gas and a few organics.

The trick.. is now the launch vehicle.

I really need a bigger VAB !!

![qMK1fAZ.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/qMK1fAZ.jpg)

It can barely lift off the pad - those russian SRBs save the day.

![jhouPsr.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/jhouPsr.jpg)

The last stage ..will we make it ?? ![:sealed:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_lipssealed.gif)

![CgEFRsM.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/CgEFRsM.jpg)

And.....we make it... with 104ms DV to spare.. not bad.

Now have a full orbiter for moon testing

![xJJjMRl.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/xJJjMRl.jpg)

![VuLf1nI.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/VuLf1nI.jpg)

It was touch and go for a moment

 ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif)

edt: looks like images are not getting though !!

Edt2: Used the tablet... browsers gone for a loop!

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-30T07:30:41Z" title="06/30/2015 07:30  AM" data-short="9 yr">June 30, 2015</time> by ColKlonk**

You're too kind, sire ! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Here are pics of the station in all it's glory....
